title: How quest sought the truth
abstract: Interactive CD Rom of Croatian Fairystory. Beautifully flash animated work that includes simple interactive games.
description: Nathan Jurevicius has a unique and delightful animation style. How Quest sought the Truth is adapted from the Croatian Fairy story by Ivana Brlic Mazuranic. It tells the story of Witting and his three grandsons who live in the Forest. The grandson venture out to seek the wisdom of Alrosy but are tempted from their path by goblins. Quest eventually finds his way back.
related_objects: Collection; B1004277; Public Programs Collection; Active
